timeline.message:
Test time type

Authored-by: Oliver Albertini <oalbertini@vmware.com>

timeline.bodyText: @lisakowen I've added these types: date, time, timestamp, and timestamp with time zone. Is there any other Greenplum type you think I should certify?
timeline.author: oliverralbertini
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -53,15 +54,23 @@
             "type_enum_mood mood",
             "type_long_array BIGINT[]",
             "type_numeric_array NUMERIC(8,1)[]",
-            "type_string_array TEXT[]"
+            "type_string_array TEXT[]",
+            "type_date DATE",
+            "type_time TIME",
+            "type_timestamp TIMESTAMP",
+            "type_timestampz TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE"

replies.bodyText: the only other one that i can think of right now is varchar.  but not sure how often one would use that type when writing to avro?
replies.author: lisakowen

replies.bodyText:
Added testing for char and varchar. (in the tests for primitive types).
We use a writable external table with char and varchar columns that write to Avro string types, and can read them back into a readable external table using the same types.
replies.author: oliverralbertini

timeline.message:
Add scalar complex types to HdfsWritableAvroTest

We convert it them to strings in Avro, but it's good to verify that it
works. Later we can support writing to the actual logical types[0] in
Avro.

* date
* time
* timestamp
* timestamp with time zone

[0] https://avro.apache.org/docs/current/spec.html#Logical+Types

Authored-by: Oliver Albertini <oalbertini@vmware.com>

Add scalar complex types to HdfsWritableAvroTest

We convert it them to strings in Avro, but it's good to verify that it
works. Later we can support writing to the actual logical types[0] in
Avro.

* date
* time
* timestamp
* timestamp with time zone

Also we add testing for primitive character types:

* char
* varchar

These types become strings in Avro, but can still be read back into the
corresponding char types in Postgres.

[0] https://avro.apache.org/docs/current/spec.html#Logical+Types
